name: unclearly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not obvious or easy to see, understand, or know: The regulations are often unclearly presented. The swollen tongue is causing the child to speak unclearly. See
unclear
More examplesFewer examplesunclearly marked ballot papersThe addition of unnecessary zeros can lead to confusion if written unclearly.We speak unclearly because we think unclearly.
